Intro

Source: vignettes/stockR.Rmd
stockR.Rmd
library(stockR)
#> Loading required package: ggplot2
#> Loading required package: raster
#> Loading required package: sp
#list the datasets in the package stockR
data(package = "stockR")
# Read the elevation dataset from stockR
elevation = as.data.frame(DEM_Hamilton)
# Some basic stats on the elevation around the Hamilton area
summary(elevation)
#>        x                y         DEM_elevation_Hamilton
#>  Min.   :-80.36   Min.   :43.08   Min.   : 56.0         
#>  1st Qu.:-80.14   1st Qu.:43.16   1st Qu.:113.0         
#>  Median :-79.93   Median :43.24   Median :208.0         
#>  Mean   :-79.93   Mean   :43.24   Mean   :189.9         
#>  3rd Qu.:-79.71   3rd Qu.:43.33   3rd Qu.:241.0         
#>  Max.   :-79.50   Max.   :43.41   Max.   :347.0
